actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to impose fees under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act for the review of applications for marketing approval for new human drugs, antibiotics, and biological products, and for other purposes.
short_title: New Drug Application Fee Amendments of 1986

summary.text: New Drug Application Fee Amendments of 1986 - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services (HHS) to establish fees sufficient to cover costs for reviewing human drug, antibiotic drug, and biological products applications. Permits waiver of such fees, as specified. Credits such fees for the use of HHS.

titles.title: New Drug Application Fee Amendments of 1986

A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to impose fees under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act for the review of applications for marketing approval for new human drugs, antibiotics, and biological products, and for other purposes.
